metadata.description: 20 specialized AI agents for social science research workflow with VS (Verbalized Sampling) methodology to prevent mode collapse in research recommendations

plugins.name: research-coordinator
plugins.description: Master coordinator with context-aware auto-dispatch for 20 research agents. Analyzes conversation to automatically activate appropriate agents with VS methodology.

plugins.name: research-design-agents
plugins.description: Theory & research design agents (01-04) with VS-enhanced theory discovery and research question refinement

plugins.name: literature-evidence-agents
plugins.description: Literature review agents (05-08) with VS-enhanced search strategies and evidence synthesis

plugins.name: methodology-analysis-agents
plugins.description: Methodology & analysis agents (09-12) with methodological diversity options beyond standard approaches

plugins.name: quality-validation-agents
plugins.description: Quality & validation agents (13-16) with context-adaptive bias detection and reproducibility assessment

plugins.name: publication-communication-agents
plugins.description: Publication & communication agents (17-20) for journal matching, academic communication, and peer review strategy

vs_methodology.description: Verbalized Sampling (VS) methodology integrated to prevent mode collapse in AI research recommendations

full.description: Complete 5-phase VS process with T-Score based alternatives

typicality_score.description: T-Score measures predictability of recommendations (0-1 scale)
